name: Demon Purge Saga (itch)
description:
During his childhood Father Emmett lost his family and his whole body got burned by a demon. Now, covered in bandages and anger, he seeks revenge. With the help of Father Dominus he will purge all the demons of the world.

Demon Purge Saga is a mix of match-3 with a battle system. Match the exorcism items to hurt the demon and save the host.
